paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper reports on various variants in the BRCA2 gene, including a total deletion of exon 3 and several other mutations, along with their clinical significance and penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: This study reports the first large rearrangement of the BRCA2 gene that includes all of exon 3 and leads to an in frame deletion of exon 3 at the transcriptional level.

functional_data.summary: The deletion leads to an in-frame deletion of exon 3, affecting transcript levels.

variants.segregation_data: The exclusive expression of the delta3 transcript by the mutant allele and segregation data provide evidence for a causal effect of the exon 3 deletion.
variants.additional_notes: The functional role of the affected protein exon 3 domain is not yet fully established.
key_quotes: Deletion of exon 3, which is in phase, does not alter the reading frame.
Exclusive expression of the delta3 transcript by the mutant allele and segregation data provide evidence for a causal effect of the exon 3 deletion.
